newsitem.title: USA: Nebraska fed cattle $106/dressed, limited - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Nebraska fed cattle $106/dressed, limited - USDA.

text.p: Trade was slow, USDA said. Limited sales slaughter steers and heifers to few for price comparison. Buyer inquiry and seller interest light.
Live basis sales - Equivalent 3 percent shrink delivered and FOB, some FOB 4% shrink. Dressed basis delivered (paid on hot carcass weights)

Slaughter Steers - Few Select and Choice 2-3 1150-1225 lbs 106.00. Slaughter Heifers - Few Select and Choice 2-3 1050-1150 lbs 106.00. Confirmed - 700 Last Week - 900 Last Year - 1,100 For Week - None Sm Pd Lst Wk -None Sm Pd Lst Yr - None.
